summary.title: Summary
summary.description: QA tester with full system development lifecycle experience, including designing, developing and implementing test plans, test cases and test processes fueling swift corrective actions, significant cost savings and fault-free audits.

career.title: Career Goal
career.description: A highly organized and hard-working individual looking for a responsible position to gain <u>practical experience</u> and to make use of my interpersonal skills to achieve goals of a company that focuses on customer satisfaction and customer experience.

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 1
description: Identified, documented and reported bugs, errors, interoperability flaws and other issues within proprietary software applications developed for ABC Company’s global user base.
Demonstrated methodical, detail-oriented and thorough approach to all assignments while adhering to compressed timelines. Complete all assignments on or ahead of schedule.
Consistently recognized for excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Worked collaboratively with QA, development and business groups to complete comprehensive testing on 2 major new releases

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 2
description: Documented and reported bugs, errors, interoperability flaws and other issues within proprietary software applications developed for ABC Company’s global user base.
Demonstrated methodical approach to all assignments while adhering to compressed timelines. Complete all assignments on or ahead of schedule.

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 3
description: Demonstrated methodical, detail-oriented and thorough approach to all assignments while adhering to compressed timelines. Complete all assignments on or ahead of schedule.
Consistently recognized for excellent problem-solving and analytical skills by programmers, project managers and supervisors
Worked collaboratively with QA, development and business groups to complete comprehensive testing on 2 major new releases

key_projects.title: Key Projects / Involvements
description: Prevented millions of dollars in state sales tax undercharges by initiating tests that revealed a bug in a new release of shopping cart software.
Isolated previously undiscovered flaw in price checking tool resulting in more competitive pricing and a 20 percent increase in revenue and progressive technological improvements for robustness.
Implemented automated testing tools spawning more diligent levels of regression testing, negative testing, error/bug retests and usability.

certificates.title: Certificates and Awards
description: Agile and Scrum Master Certificate from Udacity
Best performer award for consistently exceeding the performance
Certificate of exceptional bug finder by XYZ client
